channel.title: 562 ::update command Help!
channel.description:
Hii All
I Just Joined some Rsps And I saw that some 562 server and a runeslay that i got that the owner do a command than left up at chat box there coming this : Systeem Update 10:00 Same like runescape.com but whats the command for that so i can use that to becouse its better than i put server offline and my players think why? why its offline u understand? so if somone1 know it please help me than!
Dont Understand Tell me I will explain it better. PLEASE HELP ME

item.title: 562 ::update command Help!
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

hit the ` button, and type in “update 100” for a 1 minute update, not 60 seconds tho :rolleyes: without the quotes too btw.

Read full topic
